Token.Abstract: This protocol defines the interface to the UpsightDataStore. The UpsightDataStore is a class that stores arbitrary data objects, each with its own type. It also provides an interface by which observer methods are registered against those types. The data store calls the observers when data of the specified type is stored, removed, or updated.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The object that implements the selector.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: A method with two parameters: an id which is the object that was stored/changed/removed and an UpsightObservableAction which indicates the reason for calling the observer.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: When data of this type is stored, removed, or updated, the selector message is sent to observer.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The object that implements the selector.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: A method with two parameters: an id which is the object that was stored/changed/removed and an UpsightObservableAction which indicates the reason for calling the observer.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: When data of this type is stored, removed, or updated, the selector message is sent to observer.

Parameter.Name: queue
Parameter.Abstract: The NSOperationQueue on which the selector should be called.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The object that implements the selector.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: A method with two parameters: an id which is the object that was stored/changed/removed and an UpsightObservableAction which indicates the reason for calling the observer.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: When data of this type is stored, removed, or updated, the selector message is sent to observer.

Parameter.Name: queue
Parameter.Abstract: The NSOperationQueue on which the selector should be called.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: Only objects for which the predicate evaluates to TRUE will be sent to the observer. This evaluation is in addition to matching the type.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The object that implements the selector.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: A method with two parameters: an id which is the object that was stored/changed/removed and an UpsightObservableAction which indicates the reason for calling the observer.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: An object previously registered as an observer with one of the addObserver methods.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type for which the observer was previously registered. It was supplied as the type parameter in the call to the addObserver method.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: An object previously registered as an observer with one of the addObserver methods.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type that was supplied when the observer was registered with the addObserver method.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate that was supplied when the observer was registered with the addObserver method.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: An object previously registered as a default observer using the addDefaultObserver:observer:selector method.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An instance of a class derived from UpsightStorableObject. This object will be stored and kept until removed.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that will be executed once the object is stored. If there was a problem storing the object it will be reported in the error provided. Do not add or remove observers within this block.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to be removed from storage.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that will be executed once the object is removed. If there was a problem removing the object it will be reported in the error provided. Do not add or remove observers within this block.

Parameter.Name: objects
Parameter.Abstract: An NSArray of the objects to be removed from storage.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that will be executed once the object is removed. If there was a problem removing the object it will be reported in the error provided. If you attempt to remove an object that has not been stored, you will receive an UpsightDataStoreObjectNotPreviouslyStored error. The userInfo in the error will contain the unstored object in the key "unstoredObject". Do not add or remove observers within this block.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of object to be returned in list.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: A set of conditions to be met by the objects returned. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of all the objects of the specified type for which the predicate evaluates to TRUE.
